bibl.title: Letter from Mrs. John A. Hall to [s.n.] Murphy, July 26, 1907

div1.p: Hall sends a contribution for Kissinger.

div1.head: Letter from Mrs. John A. Hall to [s.n.] Murphy, July 26, 1907
div1.p:
The article
“A Hero in Distress” is
evidently a part of Dr.
Kelleys appeal written
for the Outlook-

I am so pleased
that kind hearts are
responding so liberally
and I thank you for
so kindly giving me
more interesting news
concerning these heroes
AC
Ki
I can read your sympathy
between the lines & feel
that were there more
hearts like yours there
would be fewer “Heroes
in Distress”
div1.closer:
Very Sincerely Mrs. John A. Hall July 26- 1907-
Marshall Mo-
